name: First Cohort Envirosuit
description: As part of the ICARUS: Supporters Edition (unavailable for purchase), prospectors received an exclusive UDA envirosuit with a built-in water slot – giving an edge to prospectors who dare pursue fortune on the moon's surface. There’s no better way to show your commitment than to wear it with pride. The First Cohort Envirosuit is researched and crafted in the Workshop on the Space Station .
